email.title: DoCSoc --- Macquarie Talk and Internship Interview Prep Session - TOMORROW

event.text:
**Our first event of the year for people looking to find out how to prepare for internship interviews** and see what life is working in a financial services company.
---
At Macquarie, we look for innovative, driven and talented students who share our drive for excellence. People who drive their own success, are high calibre, motivated and creative.
Is this you? Then come to our event to find out more about Macquarie and the role of technology in the financial sector, including some of the exciting projects we are working on in this space.
An interactive session will help you experience some of the ways in which we interview candidates for our technical interviews, and we will have plenty of time for you to chat to our graduates over pizza and soft drinks where you can ask them any questions you might have.
We look forward to meeting you!
This event will be catered with free pizza and soft drinks as usual! **Please RSVP to help us gauge our food ordering requirements.** If you have any specific dietary requirements, please let us know a few days beforehand by emailing docsoc@imperial.ac.uk
